analysis.description:
ValusCrowdsale.withdrawEther (/unique_chucks/20/0x8f8e5e6515c3e6088c327257bdcf2c973b1530ad.sol#188-197) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- this.balance == 0

ValusCrowdsale.withdrawEther (/unique_chucks/20/0x8f8e5e6515c3e6088c327257bdcf2c973b1530ad.sol#188-197) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- this.balance == 0
ValusCrowdsale.withdrawRemainingBalanceForManualRecovery (/unique_chucks/20/0x8f8e5e6515c3e6088c327257bdcf2c973b1530ad.sol#221-225) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- this.balance == 0

Reentrancy in ValusCrowdsale.claimTeamTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x8f8e5e6515c3e6088c327257bdcf2c973b1530ad.sol#168-173):
	External calls:
	- valusTokenContract.mintTokens(_to,valusTokenContract.totalSupply() * 49 / 51) (/unique_chucks/20/0x8f8e5e6515c3e6088c327257bdcf2c973b1530ad.sol#172-173)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ownerHasClaimedTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x8f8e5e6515c3e6088c327257bdcf2c973b1530ad.sol#173)

Reentrancy in ValusCrowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/20/0x8f8e5e6515c3e6088c327257bdcf2c973b1530ad.sol#85-123):
	External calls:
	- valusTokenContract.mintTokens(msg.sender,getValusTokenIssuance(block.number,maxContribution)) (/unique_chucks/20/0x8f8e5e6515c3e6088c327257bdcf2c973b1530ad.sol#111)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleHasSucessfulyEnded (/unique_chucks/20/0x8f8e5e6515c3e6088c327257bdcf2c973b1530ad.sol#112-113)

ValusCrowdsale.salvageTokensFromContract (/unique_chucks/20/0x8f8e5e6515c3e6088c327257bdcf2c973b1530ad.sol#206-210) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-IERC20Token(_tokenAddress).transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/20/0x8f8e5e6515c3e6088c327257bdcf2c973b1530ad.sol#207-210)

IValusToken.totalSupply.totalSupply (local variable @ /unique_chucks/20/0x8f8e5e6515c3e6088c327257bdcf2c973b1530ad.sol#24-26) shadows:

IERC20Token.totalSupply.totalSupply (local variable @ /unique_chucks/20/0x8f8e5e6515c3e6088c327257bdcf2c973b1530ad.sol#28) shadows:
	- IERC20Token.totalSupply (function @ /unique_chucks/20/0x8f8e5e6515c3e6088c327257bdcf2c973b1530ad.sol#27-28)

ValusCrowdsale.batchReturnEthIfFailed has external calls inside a loop:
	- ! currentParticipantAddress.send(contribution) (/unique_chucks/20/0x8f8e5e6515c3e6088c327257bdcf2c973b1530ad.sol#146-154)
